entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 4.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Greenwood 8:00 PM ADT Friday 17 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 4.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 64 %
Dewpoint: -2.0°C
Wind: ESE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening then a few flurries or rain showers beginning after midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 4 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few rain showers or flurries. High 8.
entry.summary: A few rain showers or flurries ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High 8. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers in the evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Friday 17 March 2023
